name: Police Station
description:
How about you being the nightmare of the criminals.

Catch criminal by driving your super car , polis vehicle. Arrest them in the name of law and test your driver skills. Avoid crashes in a big city tarffic and get to the criminals in shortest time you can.

Perfect 3d graphics and souns and music effect will tie you to the game. Steering wheel and gas and brake and gear options is available for you to enjoy.
There are different camera option to give you more enjoy and experience.
